how can i install or play with those formats? plz help me

Guys!nnTo install and play:nnMount the ZIP file (.img) then install.nnOnce installed goto your virtual drive and OPEN the img you have mounted and you will see the CD contents.nngoto the folder CRACKnncopy the shortcut inside there TDR2000.exennnext, goto where you have installed the game normally C:program files/scsi/tdr200/...nnand paste the TDR2000.exe file into itnnit will ask you to overwrite/copy/replace the existing exe, say yes AND PLAY :-)nnWorks perfect.

Guys!--rn----To install and play:nnMount the ZIP file (.img) then install.--rn----Once installed goto your virtual drive and OPEN the img you have mounted and you will see the CD contents.--rn----goto the folder CRACK--rn----copy the shortcut inside there TDR2000.exe--rn----next, goto where you have installed the game normally C:program files/scsi/tdr200/...--rn----paste the TDR2000.exe file into it--rn----it will ask you to overwrite/copy/replace the existing exe, say yes AND PLAY :-)--rn----Works perfect.
